name: Mahjong Dream Tour
description:
This is not a normal mahjong-matching game, but a fantastic dream tour! Join in this trip to the world of surprises!


It will be an amazing and colorful journey in your life. We are sharing simple happiness and beautiful scenes to everyone. It will become your own dream.

●Easy to play, just one finger to control.
●Cartoon arts and bouncing animation.
●Designed levels by cute shapes.
●Different types of challenges.
●Lots of gifts and items.
●Free hints to help.
●Continuously updating to create more fun.
